lines.text: Mark's a good man and a good lawyer. It's pretty tough on him he's got so bad a case he has to rake up scandal instead of evidence.
Him and Hannah's getting hitched. Couldn't happen to a better man.
I didn't know there was a vet this side of Raton.
Oh, Sam don't doctor animals. People!
Looks more like one of the Dembrow gang than a fellow that doctor's human beings.

If I was you, I wouldn't say that where the doc could hear you - if I was you. He wouldn't like it bein' mistaken for a highwayman. He's a quick man on the draw, Sam is - if'n it's a pill or a pistol.
